entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -6.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 1:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 44 %

Dewpoint: -16.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
